pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genetic Algorithm Assisted Genomic Best Liner Unbiased Prediction // Performs genetic algorithm (Scrucca, L (2013) doi:10.18637/jss.v053.i04) assisted genomic best liner unbiased prediction for genomic selection. It also provides a binning method in natural population for genomic selection under the principle of linkage disequilibrium for dimensional reduction.
